channel.title: Adding a leveling system, help?
channel.description:
Okay so basically i would like to add this to my server but im not even sure if its possible,
when you join my server at level 3, you will start with a rank, for example " nooby " next to your name, once you reach combat level 40, it become " apprentice " and so on and so fourth.

item.title: Adding a leveling system, help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Not really no.
Find where your combat level is actually set; there should be a method for it.
You’d want to add a new method in to actually set the ranks.
I don’t know where you want these ranks to be added, but yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a leveling system, help?
item.dc:creator: @bob2568 bob2568
item.description:
@bob2568 wrote:

how difficult is this to accomplish, im on a schedule before i actually launch, so if you think it would take awhile learning how to do it ill just avoid the whole thing, im not very sure where to begin.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a leveling system, help?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is completely possible.
You’d need to add a check system in to see what the combat level of the player is, and if it hits a specific level it’d change.

Read full topic
